name: Sophie la Girafe
description:
Made from 100% natural rubber, Sophie is an iconic teether for babies. 
Her light weight and ergonomic shape make Sophie the perfect toy for small hands to grip and long legs and bumpy features soothe sore gums. She even squeeks for added stimulation.
There is a reason why she has been a bestseller since 1961.

Usual price is £12.99 - take advantage of this special offer for this weekend only! (offer ends midnight Sunday 18th March 2012)

Suitable from birth.

name: Subbuteo
description:
The classic football game is back!

Subbuteo is one of the world's most iconic sports games and after 15 years off the shelves; this legendary game is back. Fans of all ages will love the new re-energised Subbuteo game with greatly improved detail.

No longer will players need to be glued back together having broken from the base yet again - the new players are so strong and flexible. A new and improved pitch means your teams will never have moved so quickly and accurately. With unparalleled detail;stronger and more flexible players you can now dazzle everyone with your skills. Pick your team; decide your game plan and victory will be at your fingertips! 

Limited Numbers - Order now to avoid disappointment!

Age 8+

name: Skull 'n' CrossBones Cushion
description:
Bring maximum comfort to the Galley with this exceptional cushion. 

Even Pirates enjoy comfort, and with the bold black and white design this will be the most sought after accessory on the high seas. Fortunately you will not have to travel too far to own one of these iconic cushions which look fantastic on a bed, a sofa, or perhaps a hammock. 

Made from top quality materials, the Skull 'n' Crossbones cushion measures approximately 40cm square and is expertly hand stitched by locally based Bright 'n' Beautiful. 

What's more you will not find them anywhere else as they are exclusive to Cheeky Monkeys.

name: Mini Micro Scooter
description:
Expertly engineered to help your child develop fundamental balance and co-ordination skills, the Mini Micro Scooter is the ideal way to get out and about. 

At 1.5kg the T-Bar handles can easily be taken out from the base for easy transportation and the stickers included help to personalise your scooter. 

Height: 670mm
Length: 550mm
Diameter of Wheels: 120/80mm
Width of Wheels: 24mm
Width of Deck: 110mm
Weight: 1500gr

name: Lego Minifigures Series 5
description:
Get 5 from Series 5!

Lego have done it again and produced another fantastic series of the ever popular limited edition Minifigures. Hidden inside a mysterious foil packet will be one the following 16 highly collectible characters. Who will you find?

The Boxer
Cave Woman
Egyption Queen
Small Clown
Evil Dwarf
Ice Fisherman
Fitness Instructor
Detective
Lizard Man
Gangster
Royal Guard
Lumberjack
Snowboarder Guy
Gladiator
Graduate
Zookeeper

Purchase 5 right now - We will guarantee all of them will be different. 

Please email special requests to info@cheeky-monkeys.me.uk and we will endeavour to find your specific minifigure/s. 

Remember, some are harder to find than others!
